statements: SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops;
SELECT crop_name, genetic_type FROM genetically_modified_crops;
SELECT crop_name, modified_trait FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE genetic_type = 'GMO';
SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, genetic_type, modified_trait FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE crop_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT crop_name, genetic_type FROM genetically_modified_crops;
SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, modified_trait FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE genetic_type = 'GMO';
SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT genetic_type FROM genetically_modified_crops;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, scientific_name FROM crops WHERE growth_period > 5;
SELECT crop_name, trait, value FROM characteristics JOIN crops ON characteristics.crop_id = crops.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, scientific_name FROM crops WHERE growth_period < 3 ORDER BY scientific_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, scientific_name FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, trait, value FROM crops INNER JOIN characteristics ON crops.crop_id = characteristics.crop_id WHERE characteristics.trait = 'Height';
SELECT crop_name, scientific_name FROM crops WHERE growth_period > 3 ORDER BY growth_period DESC;
SELECT crop_name, trait FROM crops LEFT JOIN characteristics ON crops.crop_id = characteristics.crop_id WHERE characteristics.value = 'Disease-resistant';
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, genetic_info FROM crops WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM traits WHERE dominant = TRUE ORDER BY trait_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM crops WHERE date_planted > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_planted DESC;
SELECT id, harvest_date, yield FROM harvest WHERE quality_rating >= 7;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE growth_stage = 'reproductive';
SELECT crop_name, genetic_info FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM traits WHERE dominant = TRUE AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT crop_name, date_planted, COUNT(*) FROM crops GROUP BY crop_name, date_planted HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT t.trait_name, c.crop_name, h.yield FROM traits t JOIN crops c ON t.crop_id = c.id JOIN harvest h ON c.id = h.crop_id WHERE h.yield > 100 AND h.quality_rating > 5 ORDER BY h.yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT name, species FROM crops WHERE species='Grains';
SELECT id, name, description FROM crops ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_characteristics WHERE growth_time > 100;
SELECT modification_name, modification_type FROM genetic_modifications WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT name, species FROM crops ORDER BY species DESC;
SELECT description FROM crops WHERE id = 3;
SELECT cc.growth_time, cc.yield_per_acre, c.name FROM crop_characteristics cc INNER JOIN crops c ON cc.crop_id = c.id WHERE cc.yield_per_acre > 100;
SELECT rs.study_title, rs.researcher_name, c.species FROM research_studies rs INNER JOIN crops c ON rs.crop_id = c.id ORDER BY rs.study_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT name, species FROM crops WHERE species = 'Wheat';
SELECT * FROM crop_locations ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT id, researcher_name, research_date FROM crop_research WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_characteristics WHERE color = 'Green' AND size = 'Large';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE species = 'Wheat';
SELECT id, name, genetic_traits FROM crops WHERE growth_period = 'Winter';
SELECT name, species, growth_period FROM crops ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_characteristics WHERE color = 'Green' AND size = 'Medium';
SELECT crop_id, researcher_name, research_topic, research_date FROM crop_research WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY research_date DESC;
